definition: used of mollusks having two shells (as clams etc.), marine or freshwater mollusks having a soft body with platelike gills enclosed within two shells hinged together
details:
adjective
- used of mollusks having two shells (as clams etc.)
= synonyms: bivalved
noun
- marine or freshwater mollusks having a soft body with platelike gills enclosed within two shells hinged together
= synonyms: lamellibranch, pelecypod
